Member Function Documentation

ears::ASSOCRES_T ears::Model2::scoreAll (  )  [virtual]

Implements Model 2 of Balog. et. al.

Calculates for each query and entity as follows:

  • For each query
    1. Init with value 0 for all entities.
    2. Determine a set of relevant documents by scoring documents using a standard language modeling approach. That is, calculate the query likelihood (using either Jelinek-Mercer or Dirichlet smoothing).
    3. Optionally, limit the number of documents taken into account (i.e., limit the size of ).
    4. For each of the documents :
      • For each entity associated with document (that is, if ):

Implements ears::AssociationModel.
